meaningMnemonic: Your <kanji>body</kanji> goes through <kanji>test</kanji>s and each time it does, it gains a little more <vocabulary>experience</vocabulary>. What has your body experienced? What tests has your body been through?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
